thread.title: Ghana FA Executive Committee cast complete; members to be sworn in next month at Congress
thread.title_full: Ghana FA Executive Committee cast complete; members to be sworn in next month at Congress

title: Ghana FA Executive Committee cast complete; members to be sworn in next month at Congress
text:
Sports News | 13 October 2015 03:55 CET Ghana FA Executive Committee cast complete; members to be sworn in next month at Congress - www.ghanasoccernet.com Past Ghana FA Executive Committee 
The cast for the 22-man Ghana Football Association Executive Committee was completed on Monday after regional elections in Greater Accra and Volta Regions. 
Representatives were elected by the Constituent bodies, Premier and Division One League clubs and the various Regional Football Associations. 
For more Ghana football news visit www.ghanasoccernet.com
